Dip/ Spread : Guacamole ü•ë : Mexican Cuisine Servings: 4 toasted breads or dip for tortillas Duration: 10 mins I'm sure, I first tasted guacamole when my hubby made at home as I was hungry and wanna eat something scrumptious and most important it can prepare in less time ‚ò∫Ô∏è because its such a quick dip or spread or you can also use for any salad as dressing. So as you guessed, I learnt this recipe from my hubby üíë and all credit goes to him üòç I hope you like it and try at home üè° Guacamole is a base of ripped Avacado ü•ë which contains chilly, salt, onion, tomato, cilantro and lemon juice. It can either prepared with basil or peas as base Ingredient & also you can replace green chilly with jalape√±os or cayenne pepper. As you all know I love Avacado and for health benefits click this link Let's start with Ingredients and follows procedure Ingredients:
  • Ripened Avacado - 1 - peeled off & de seed - Mashed
  • White onion - 1 small sized - finely chopped
  • Ripened tomato üçÖ - 1 small sized - deseed - Finely chopped
  • Cilantro/ coriander leaves - 3 tb sp - finely chopped
  • Salt - 3/4 tsp
  • Lemon - 1 - I used one full lemon juice
  • Green chilly - 1 - finely chopped
Procedure:
  • In a bowl add mashed Avacado
  • Next add salt, chopped green chilly, onion, tomato , cilantro
  • Combine well by using spoon and finally add lemon juice
  • Mix well and Guacamole is ready to serve
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust salt and spicy level according to taste
  • When the guacamole is exposure to air slowly it turns to brown color. To avoid this store guacamole in an airtight container or cover it with clear plastic wrap
